title: Border Fragment, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, continuous braid-like
provenance: Ex-collection: Ida Schiff and Frances Morris
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border fragment of three rows of very small squares filled and connected by linear pattern.
